Weston.Somerset Academy High School:
Somerset Academy is a high school located in Pembroke Pines, Florida which teaches grades K-12.The school is operated by Academica, an education management organization, on behalf of Somerset Academy Inc., a charter management organization.
The school tries to promote a culture that maximizes student achievement and fosters the development of responsible, self-directed lifelong learners in a safe and enriching environment. They are currently an "A" school.
